name: RTCPeerConnection.createOffer
description: The createOffer() method of the RTCPeerConnection interface initiates the creation of an SDP offer for the purpose of starting a new WebRTC connection to a remote peer.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
